trans-unit.source: A class that enables you to associate easing functions with a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ByteAnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref> key frame animation.
trans-unit.target: 類別，可讓您將 easing 函式與<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ByteAnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref>主要畫面格動畫。

trans-unit.source: For an example of using an object similar to this one, see <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingDoubleKeyFrame>.
trans-unit.target: 如需使用類似下列的物件的範例，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingDoubleKeyFrame>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingDoubleKeyFrame>

trans-unit.source: This class is used as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ByteKeyFrameCollection> in conjunction with a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ByteAnimationUsingKeyFrames> to animate a <xref:System.Byte> property value along a set of key frames.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別用做為一部分<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ByteKeyFrameCollection>搭配<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ByteAnimationUsingKeyFrames>以動畫方式顯示<xref:System.Byte>沿著一組主要畫面格的屬性值。</xref:System.Byte> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ByteAnimationUsingKeyFrames> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ByteKeyFrameCollection>

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ByteKeyFrame> interpolates between the <xref:System.Byte> value of the previous key frame and its own value linearly with an easing function to produce its output value.
trans-unit.target: 這<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ByteKeyFrame>間進行插補<xref:System.Byte>先前的主要畫面格和它自己的值，以線性方式與來產生其輸出值加/減速函式的值。</xref:System.Byte> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ByteKeyFrame>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingByteKeyFrame"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingByteKeyFrame"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingByteKeyFrame"></xref> class with the specified <xref:System.Byte> value.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingByteKeyFrame"></xref>類別具有指定<xref:System.Byte>值。</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: The initial <xref:System.Byte> value.
trans-unit.target: 初始<xref:System.Byte>值。</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingByteKeyFrame"></xref> class with the specified <xref:System.Byte> value and key time.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingByteKeyFrame"></xref>類別具有指定<xref:System.Byte>值和 key time。</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: The initial <xref:System.Byte> value.
trans-unit.target: 初始<xref:System.Byte>值。</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: The initial key time.
trans-unit.target: 初始的 key time。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingByteKeyFrame"></xref> class with the specified <xref:System.Byte> value, key time, and easing function.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingByteKeyFrame"></xref>類別具有指定<xref:System.Byte>值、 key time、 和 easing 函式。</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: The initial <xref:System.Byte> value.
trans-unit.target: 初始<xref:System.Byte>值。</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: The initial key time.
trans-unit.target: 初始的 key time。

trans-unit.source: The easing function.
trans-unit.target: Easing 函式中。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"></xref> derived class.
trans-unit.target: 建立的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"></xref>衍生的類別。

trans-unit.source: When creating a derived class, you must override this method.
trans-unit.target: 當建立衍生的類別時，您必須覆寫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Animation classes inherit indirectly from <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>間接繼承動畫類別

trans-unit.source: Because of this, you need to override the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase.CreateInstanceCore%2A> method to construct a custom animation object.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您必須覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase.CreateInstanceCore%2A>建構自訂動畫物件的方法。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase.CreateInstanceCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: The new instance.
trans-unit.target: 新的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the easing function applied to the key frame.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定套用至主要畫面格的加/減速函數。

trans-unit.source: The easing function applied to the key frame.
trans-unit.target: 套用至主要畫面格的加/減速函數。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingByteKeyFrame.EasingFunction*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingByteKeyFrame.EasingFunction*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingByteKeyFrame.EasingFunction*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Interpolates, according to the easing function used, between the previous key frame value and the value of the current key frame, using the supplied progress increment.
trans-unit.target: 進行插補，根據 easing 函式使用時，在上一個主要畫面格值與目前的主要畫面格，使用提供的漸次累加值之間。

trans-unit.source: The value to animate from.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立動畫的來源值。

trans-unit.source: A value between 0.0 and 1.0, inclusive, that specifies the percentage of time that has elapsed for this key frame.
trans-unit.target: 介於 0.0 和 1.0 (含)，之間的值，指定這個主要畫面格經過時間的百分比。

trans-unit.source: The output value of this key frame given the specified base value and progress.
trans-unit.target: 這個主要畫面格的輸出值會指定指定基底值和進度。
